languages.text: {n}Вы могли бы проявить милосердие... Потом. Когда у вас будут ответы. Нечто практически осязаемое будто касается вашего горла и замораживает слова в нем. Судьба настойчиво дергает поводок, и пальцы на израненной руке Фроше сжимаются сильнее.{/n}

{n}You might decide to show mercy... Later. When you have answers. Something almost tangible seems to touch your throat, freezing the words in it. Fate is yanking the leash insistently, and the fingers on Froscher's battered hand tighten their grip.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы могли бы проявить милосердие... Потом. Когда у вас будут ответы. Нечто практически осязаемое будто касается вашего горла и замораживает слова в нем. Судьба настойчиво дергает поводок, и пальцы на израненной руке Фроше сжимаются сильнее.{/n}

{n}You might decide to show mercy... Later. When you have the answers. Something almost tangible seems to touch your throat, freezing the words in it. Fate is yanking the leash insistently, and the fingers of Froscher's battered hand tighten their grip.{/n}

{n}You might decide to show mercy... Later. When you have answers. Something almost tangible seems to touch your throat, freezing the words in it. Fate is yanking the leash insistently, and the fingers on Froscher's battered hand tighten their grip.{/n}

{n}You might decide to show mercy... Later. When you have answers. Something almost tangible seems to touch your throat, freezing the words in it. Fate is yanking the leash insistently, and the fingers on Froscher's battered hand tighten their grip.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你打算大发慈悲……但随后就意识到发生了什么事情。似乎有什么有形的东西锁住了你的喉咙，让你根本说不出话来。命运用力地拖着你脖子上的缰绳，而弗罗舍饱受摧残的手指也钳得越来越紧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You might decide to show mercy... Later. When you have answers. Something almost tangible seems to touch your throat, freezing the words in it. Fate is yanking the leash insistently, and the fingers on Froscher's battered hand tighten their grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你打算大发慈悲……但随后就意识到发生了什么事情。似乎有什么有形的东西锁住了你的喉咙，让你根本说不出话来。命运用力地拖着你脖子上的缰绳，而弗罗舍饱受摧残的手指也钳得越来越紧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは慈悲を示そうと思うのかもしれない…後に。答えが分かった時に。何かがあなたの喉に触れて、言葉を凍結させている。運命は執拗に鎖を引っ張っており、フロッシャーはボロボロの指で、強く拳を握りしめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You might decide to show mercy... Later. When you have answers. Something almost tangible seems to touch your throat, freezing the words in it. Fate is yanking the leash insistently, and the fingers on Froscher's battered hand tighten their grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは慈悲を示そうと思うのかもしれない…後に。答えが分かった時に。何かがあなたの喉に触れて、言葉を凍結させている。運命は執拗に鎖を引っ張っており、フロッシャーはボロボロの指で、強く拳を握りしめていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Podrías decidir mostrar piedad... Más adelante. Cuando tengas las respuestas. Algo casi tangible parece rozar tu garganta, congelando las palabras en ella. El destino tira insistentemente de la correa y los dedos de la maltratada mano de Froscher aprietan su agarre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You might decide to show mercy... Later. When you have answers. Something almost tangible seems to touch your throat, freezing the words in it. Fate is yanking the leash insistently, and the fingers on Froscher's battered hand tighten their grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Podrías decidir mostrar piedad... Más adelante. Cuando tengas las respuestas. Algo casi tangible parece rozar tu garganta, congelando las palabras en ella. El destino tira insistentemente de la correa y los dedos de la maltratada mano de Froscher aprietan su agarre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du könntest entscheiden, Gnade zu zeigen ... Später. Wenn du die Antworten hast. Etwas fast Greifbares scheint deine Kehle zu berühren und die Worte darin einfrieren zu lassen. Das Schicksal reißt nachdrücklich an der Leine, und die Finger von Froschers zerstörter Hand greifen stärker zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You might decide to show mercy... Later. When you have answers. Something almost tangible seems to touch your throat, freezing the words in it. Fate is yanking the leash insistently, and the fingers on Froscher's battered hand tighten their grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du könntest entscheiden, Gnade zu zeigen ... Später. Wenn du die Antworten hast. Etwas fast Greifbares scheint deine Kehle zu berühren und die Worte darin einfrieren zu lassen. Das Schicksal reißt nachdrücklich an der Leine, und die Finger von Froschers zerstörter Hand greifen stärker zu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Peut-être ferez-vous preuve de miséricorde... plus tard, quand vous aurez les réponses que vous attendez. Quelque chose de presque tangible effleure votre gorge, retenant les mots que vous vous apprêtiez à prononcer. Le destin tire avec insistance sur votre fil, et vous resserrez vos doigts sur le poignet meurtri de Froscher.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You might decide to show mercy... Later. When you have answers. Something almost tangible seems to touch your throat, freezing the words in it. Fate is yanking the leash insistently, and the fingers on Froscher's battered hand tighten their grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Peut-être ferez-vous preuve de miséricorde... plus tard, quand vous aurez les réponses que vous attendez. Quelque chose de presque tangible effleure votre gorge, retenant les mots que vous vous apprêtiez à prononcer. Le destin tire avec insistance sur votre fil, et vous resserrez vos doigts sur le poignet meurtri de Froscher.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Merhamet gösterebilirsin... Ancak henüz değil. Cevabını alana dek olmaz. Boğazına âdeta somut bir şey değiyor ve sözlerin donup kalıyor. Bir yandan kader inatla yularını çekerken diğer yandan Froscher'ın hırpalanmış eli, boğazını sıktıkça sıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You might decide to show mercy... Later. When you have answers. Something almost tangible seems to touch your throat, freezing the words in it. Fate is yanking the leash insistently, and the fingers on Froscher's battered hand tighten their grip.{/n}
